nodes.text: Danna Fajji was the Baron Administrator of Hologram Fun World during the Galactic Civil War. He was a short, rotund man with rosy cheeks and a scruffy red goatee. Fajji demonstrated the Nightmare Machine for Lando Calrissian, Tash and Zak Arranda, insisting that it was perfectly safe. Further, he tried to con Calrissian into investing in the space-based theme park by filling the nearly vacant park with holographic visitors.
